name: Mayan Chasms
description:
We are playing as a grave robber who found out that there was a newly found mayan temple. Of course we are going in there and loot anything valuable. But to get to the treasures we need to solve the puzzles made by the people who lived here once. 

Will our thief be able to get away with these treasures?

This is a game we made as our final project of 2. year in university.
